front.title: ISO/IEC Standard for Information Technology--Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX®) System--Test Methods for Measuring Conformance to POSIX®--Part 1: System Interfaces

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: ISO/IEC 14515-1:2000(E) (IEEE Std 2003.1-1992) provides a definition of the requirements placed upon providers of POSIX test methods for POSIX.1 (ISO/IEC 9945-1:1990; IEEE Std 1003.1-1990). These requirements consist of a POSIX.1-ordered list of assertions defining those aspects of POSIX.1 that are to be tested and the associated test methods that are to be used in performing those tests. This standard is aimed primarily at POSIX.1 test suite providers and POSIX.1 implementors. This standard specifies those aspects of POSIX.1 that shall be verified by conformance test methods.
